title: Margaret Thatcher Historical Retrospective
description:
Margaret Thatcher Historical Retrospective

This torrent is a series of documentaries and dramatizations dealing with the Margaret Thatcher years as Prime Minister of Great Britain. Most of these files were found on thebox dot biz. Notes and such can be found there, or in the individual files. I have arranged them in roughly chronological order.
 <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Thatcher" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Thatcher</a>

Margaret Thatcher (PM 1979-90) ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ was transformative in the history of both Britain and the Conservative (Tory) party. Staunchly anti-socialist, anti-union, and anti-Europe, she spoke long and often of returning Britain to strength and greatness. A divisive figure, often closely identified with Ronald Reagan, she broke the power of the unions and led the UK to victory in the Falklands War. Today, she is remembered with great nostalgia by the right, and is deeply scorned by the left. What is unquestioned, however, is the metamorphic effect she had on British politics; leading to the ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“New LeftÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ of Tony Blair, and ultimately to the recent election of David Cameron.
